meanings: [명사] answer, reply, response, [동사] answer, reply (to), respond (to)

vlive.korean: 제가 대답해버린 게 너무... The fact that I answered... 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “아기천사즈 칭찬 대파티” (한결, 도현 : H&D)
대답해 - 뭐 해야 되지? Answer me. - What should I do? 듣기 View video OSEN : PENTAGON 펜타곤, 벌칙의 주인공은? (ft.애교의 늪) #스타로드 02
vlive.english: Answer me. - What should I do?

vlive.korean: [점점 산으로 가는 대답] 재혁이 형의 사랑? [Wrong answer] JAE HYUK's love? 듣기 View video TREASURE (트레저) : TREASURE - [T.M.I] EP.4
[창조 대답의 귀재] - 찰리와 초콜릿 -인정? [Creative answer] - "Charlie and the Chocolate Factory". - Right? 듣기 View video TREASURE (트레저) : TREASURE - [T.M.I] EP.4
vlive.english: [Creative answer] - "Charlie and the Chocolate Factory". - Right?

vlive.korean: 내가 이 전 질문은 굉장히 잘 영어로 대답할 수 있었을 것 같은데 아... and I would think that I could have answered well on the previous question. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 다시 🐢
vlive.english: and I would think that I could have answered well on the previous question.

examples.korean: He answered with an air of detachment. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 무심한 태도로 대답했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He answered with an air of detachment. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Keep your answers as succinct as possible. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 대답은 가능한 한[최대한] 간단명료하게 하라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Keep your answers as succinct as possible. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Her answer was greeted with cries of outrage. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 대답에 분노에 찬 고함들이 터져 나왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her answer was greeted with cries of outrage. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She gulped nervously before trying to answer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 대답을 하기 전에 초조한 듯 침을 꿀떡 삼켰다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She gulped nervously before trying to answer. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I rang the doorbell. Ding-dong! No answer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 초인종을 울렸어. 딩동 하고 말야! 아무 대답이 없었어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I rang the doorbell. Ding-dong! No answer. Add to Wordbook
